summary:
We need to produce JSON with keys: summary, business_intent, keywords (list). Must not list method names verbatim. Focus on class responsibility and state/behavior. Provide English.

We have class MelSpectrogram: preprocessing layer converting raw audio signals to Mel spectrograms using STFT and mel scaling. Accepts float32/float64 audio tensors (1D or 2D). Output 2D/3D mel spectrograms. Configurable parameters: fft_length, sequence_stride, sequence_length, window, sampling_rate, num_mel_bins, min_freq, max_freq, power_to_db, top_db, mag_exp, ref_power, min_power. Provide ability to compute mel weight matrix, etc.

Now produce summary: "A Keras preprocessing layer that transforms raw audio waveforms into mel‑scaled spectrogram representations suitable for downstream audio ML models."

Business intent: "Enable developers to incorporate audio feature extraction directly in model pipelines, simplifying preprocessing for speech, speaker, or music classification tasks."

Keywords: list of relevant terms: "audio preprocessing", "mel spectrogram", "STFT", "frequency scaling", "speech recognition", "music classification", "Keras layer", "feature extraction", "signal processing", "deep learning".

Make sure not to list method names. Provide JSON.

Summary: "A Keras preprocessing layer that converts raw audio waveforms into mel‑scaled spectrogram tensors using short‑time Fourier transform and mel filter banks."

Business intent: "Provides an out‑of‑the‑box feature extractor so that machine‑learning pipelines can ingest audio data without separate preprocessing steps, accelerating development of speech, speaker identification, and music analysis models."
